name: Demo's Souls

Demo's Souls is a dark fantasy action RPG exclusively for PC.

Play as the Demoman from Team Fortress 2 and stumble through the land of Scotland, now cursed with neverending sobriety. Keep your scrumpy close to your chest, for you must drink to survive.

To be more serious, this is an incredibly short tech demo I whipped up in a fit of madness for April Fool's Day 2022 over the course of a few days. I'm a big fan of From Software's Dark Souls games and I've been having a blast playing Elden Ring recently, so I wanted to try my hand at making my own Souls-style game. This project was somewhat inspired by Krunkidile's Quest of the Demoknight video as well. The idea of having a dark fantasy action-RPG starring a sword-wielding Demoman is SO cool yet so silly, and it's stuck with me all these years. Just had to get it out of my system
